description: This file defines a custom theme for a Flutter application, encapsulated in the AppTheme class. It provides methods and properties to generate light and dark themes based on a seed color, customizing various UI elements.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class for generating customized theme data for a Flutter app, supporting both light and dark modes.

methods.name: _base
methods.description: A private static method that creates a base ThemeData object given a ColorScheme, customizing UI component styles.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static getter that provides the light mode theme based on a seed color.

methods.name: darkTheme
methods.description: A static getter that provides the dark mode theme based on a seed color.
